TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DownloadFileGroupCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

summary.span: 描述最近完成的文件下载。

span.span: Describes a file download that has recently completed.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例将下载名为的文件组 `HelpFiles` ，并在状态栏中显示下载进度。The following code example downloads a file group named `HelpFiles`, and displays download progress in a status bar. 此示例要求你部署一个 Windows 窗体应用程序，并且主窗体具有一个 控件和一个 名为的控件 `downloadStatus` 。This example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application, and that your main form has a control, and a control named `downloadStatus`. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Group As String
public: property System::String ^ Group { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取正在下载的文件组的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the file group being downloaded.

value.span: 一个表示文件组名称的 。

span.span: A representing the name of the file group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以启动多个对的调用 并同时下载多个文件组。You can initiate multiple calls to and download multiple file groups simultaneously. 使用 确定与哪个组相对应的事件回调。Use to determine which event callbacks correspond to which group. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将下载名为的文件组 `HelpFiles` ，并在状态栏中显示下载进度。The following code example downloads a file group named `HelpFiles`, and displays download progress in a status bar. 此示例要求你部署一个 Windows 窗体应用程序，并且主窗体具有一个 控件和一个 名为的控件 `downloadStatus` 。This example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application, and that your main form has a control, and a control named `downloadStatus`. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#8)]
